mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_TBL (PRO_NUM, CG_CODE, PRO_NAME, PRO_PRICE, PRO_DISCOUNT, PRO_PUBLISHER, PRO_CONTENT, PRO_UP_FOLDER, PRO_IMG, PRO_AMOUNT, PRO_BUY) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT_TBL.NEXTVAL,#{cg_code},#{pro_name},#{pro_price},#{pro_discount}, #{pro_publisher},#{pro_content},#{pro_up_folder},#{pro_img},#{pro_amount},#{pro_buy})
